attributes.action: Petition King Charles III to abolish The House of Commons and The House of Lords
attributes.additional_details: As is evident with recent times, the British Parliament is an unproductive relic of a medieval world; and that is where it should stay.
attributes.background: A member of Parliament or the Government should petition the current reigning monarch, His Majesty King Charles III; to abolish the institutions of The House of Commons and The House of Lords, both making up the greater institution of Parliament.

rejection.details: We understand that you would like to see the House of Lords and the House of Commons abolished, but it is not within the Monarchy's jurisdiction to remove Parliament.
